---
title: "Dictation"
listing:
    contents: 
        - "dictation/**/*/**.qmd"
    type: grid
    fields: [image, date, title, subtitle, categories, author, reading-time]
    sort: "date desc"
    sort-ui: false
    filter-ui: false
    page-size: 9         

page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
comments: false
toc: true

format:
    html:
        include-in-header:
            - text: |
                    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0/css/all.min.css"
---
